definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The escaped prisoner is still at large.
The escapees – hidden behind various shelves – look on with concern.
sentences.chinese: 越獄犯一夥藏身在架子後面，關切地注意情況的變化。

sentences.english: the escaped prisoner is still at large.
